content:
Specialists of the Main Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and activists of the BO Team group have carried out a number of cyberattacks on the objects of the aggressor state of Russia.

This is said inmessageGur.

Not only Russian state but also private structures that pay taxes and finance the war against Ukraine were struck.

During the week from 11 to 18 March 2024:

the resources of PJSC "Rosteliek" - disrupted the communication equipment of the Transbaikal and Krasnoyarsk region of the Russian Federation;

Access to the system of electronic document circulation "Rights of Belgorod region", fake mailing of 12 thousand local officials was made;

The communication equipment of Belznak LLC was attacked and disrupted;

Information resources of the "municipal budgetary students of the Old Oscol City Multiple Trans -Driving Association of Municipal Housing" have been attacked and destroyed;

the infrastructure of CJSC "Tommoloko" was attacked and destroyed;

The server infrastructure was captured and destroyed with 1GB.ru hosting provider and tens of thousands of websites he served;

More than 40 Mikrotik network devices have been displayed in the Center for Gorodia City Auto -Electotransport in Novosibirsk.

The damage caused to the enemy can be calculated by hundreds of thousands of dollars. Attacks on Cyberspace continue.
title: GUR reported details of new large -scale cyberattacks on Russia
description: This is stated in GUR. Not only the Russian state but ... ...
author: Army Inform
